channel.title: Other on tlocrt

item.title: Website
item.description: This website was created in Hugo. Since I’m a web development noob, it took a small eternity. But it was fun! What you’re seeing is a custom Hugo theme, developed by following the first ~1/3 of the helpful book Build Websites with Hugo by Brian P. Hogan and then freestyling (aka typing semi-coherent questions into various search engines and LLMs until something started working). Features Features that took way more time than they should have and that probably nobody else will pay any attention to include:
